attributes.action: Romanians and Bulgarians UK tax payers
attributes.additional_details:
We urge the British government and institutions to take action and levy the requirement for Romanians and Bulgarians to apply for accession worker cards and grant this group the same working rights in the UK as all other EU nationals.
Given that every person signing this petition is a NI and/or UTR holder and therefore UK tax payers the British government should take into account that Romanians and Bulgarians are beneficial to the UK society/ economy.
